name: Sooky Chook
description:
Sooky Chook follows our intrepid CHICKEN MURDERERS as they try to run their own chicken farm. It's an emotional rollercoaster!

This is a student game prototype. Keep an eye out because we're going to keep working on it (and make it networked)

Lachlan Phillips
John Engstrom
Aaron McDougall
Tom Bartle
Robert McVicker
Cameron Bonde (the teacher)

Extra bits Maya Valentine
